member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_MODE
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves a value indicating if the specified rate control mode is supported for video encoding with the specified codec.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_MODE.NodeIndex
member.summary: In multi-adapter operation, this indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_MODE.Codec
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the codec for which rate control mode support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_MODE.RateControlMode
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the rate control mode for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_RATE_CONTROL_MODE.IsSupported
member.summary: Receives a boolean value indicating if the specified rate control mode is supported for the specified codec.
